wordpressPage.title: Website Design Service for Artists
wordpressPage.content:
Now Partnered with VintiPress

Want an online presence for your art but feel overwhelmed by the thought of

    • choosing between thousands of themes and plugins
    • finding the right host
    • putting it all together into an attractive and easy-to-update website?
We’ve made the process quick and easy, allowing you to focus on what matters most: creating your art.

You simply choose between our three themes, vetted for beauty and ease-of-use, then we complete the most technical work for you and provide a friendly, jargon-free walkthrough behind the scenes to get you comfortable with updating your new site.

The best part? Specializing in such a small niche allows us to focus, keeping the cost of the service very affordable.

Visit VintiPress.com now to learn more and to find out if VintiPress is right for you.

(It’s also great for small business website design – check it out!)
